cookie-usage: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience. You can choose for each category to opt-in/out whenever you want.
login-span1: User login. If you don’t have an account, one will be created for you after logging in with your email.
login-span2: Introducing passwordless login! You no longer need a password—logging into Jobs is now easier and more secure.
login-span3: How does it work? Instead of relying on a traditional password, when you log in from a new browser, you’ll receive a code via email. Simply enter the code, and you’re in!
login-span4: Why is it easier and more secure? You no longer need to create and remember complex passwords, nor worry about reusing the same password on different sites.
login-verify-span1: You no longer need a password. A 6-digit code has been sent to your email.
login-verify-span3: Do not close this page until you receive the code (depending on your email provider, it may take 5–10 minutes).
login-verify-span4: The code is valid for 10 minutes after it is generated.
login-verify-span5: Just enter the code here and you're all set:
didnt-recieve-code-1: If you are not receiving a code:
didnt-recieve-code-2: Check above to ensure that you have entered your email address correctly.
didnt-recieve-code-3: Make sure you are not entering a different email address than the one linked to your account.
didnt-recieve-code-4: Wait 5–10 minutes (depending on your email provider, the email may be delayed).
didnt-recieve-code-5: Check your "Spam" folder. To ensure reliable and timely delivery of the confirmation email, if it has been marked as "Spam," depending on your email provider, mark the email as "Not Spam" or add the email address to your "Safe Senders" list and/or your contacts. For instructions on how to do this, refer to your email provider's help page or contact them.
didnt-recieve-code-6: If you still do not receive the code, use the button below to resend it.
edit-name-text: Important! Changing the name in your account will update the name in all of your applications.
edit-phone-text: Important: Changing the phone number in your account will also update the phone number in all your applications
change-email-one-2: It's important to keep this email up to date because:
change-email-one-3: you receive the login code for your account on it
change-email-one-4: this is the contact email that companies receive when you apply
change-email-two-1: You no longer need a password. A 7-digit code has been sent to your old email.
change-email-two-3: To continue, please enter the code you received:
photo-text: Here you can add or update the photo in your account. It is recommended to use a passport-style photo.
accept-delete-text: Are you sure you want to delete your current photo?
my-files-description: Here are the external CVs and files you have uploaded. These files will be used when applying for jobs
delete-file: Are you sure you want to delete the file?
business-apply-description: Enter the information below and wait for approval from an administrator
title: Title
suitsNoExperience: Suitable for candidates with little or no experience
not-approved-warning: Your job listing is under review. Please wait an admin to review it!
admin-review-job: Job listing awaits review by admin!
approved-listing: Job listing is approved by admin and is currently live!
archive-job-message: Are you sure you want to archive the job listing? Once archived no one can apply to it! This is an irreversible process!
archived-job-warning: Job listing is archived, applications are no longer permitted!
